entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
